item.title: Handy Keymaps in Vim
item.description: In my first two posts in this Vim series, I talked about finding files in Vim and having a minimal Vim setup. In this post I’m going to go over some useful keymaps and functions you can use in Vim to boost your text editing abilities and to master the Vim wizardry. I will only cover keymaps that don’t include external plugins except for section #2 which will be about generating tags (I couldn’t leave this part without covering it).

item.title: Minimal Vim
